Anemia.Acute: prevMinHb > lowHb  && prevMinHc > lowHc  &&  ( minHb < lowHb  || minHc < lowHc  )

Anemia.Anemic: ( minHb < lowHb || minHc < lowHc ) && ( prevMinHb ==-1 && prevMinHc ==-1 )

Anemia.Chronic: ( minHb < lowHb || minHc < lowHc ) && ( prevMinHb < lowHb || prevMinHc < lowHc )

Pancytopenia.Due to Chemotherapy: minWBC < lowWBC && minRBC < lowRBC && minPLT < lowPLT

Pancytopenia.Due to Drugs: minWBC < lowWBC && minRBC < lowRBC && minPLT < lowPLT

Pancytopenia.Not Otherwise Specified: minWBC < lowWBC && minRBC < lowRBC && minPLT < lowPLT

SIRS.Due to non infectious process: maxHR > 90  ||2 maxRespRate > 20  ||2 maxBands > 10  ||2  ( maxTemp < 36  || maxTemp > 38.3  )  ||2  ( minWBC < 4000  || minWBC > 12000  )

SEPSIS.Severe Sepsis: SIRS !=-1  &&  ( sysBP < 90  || maxCreatinine >= 2  || maxLacticAcid > 72  || minPLT < 100  || maxPTT > 60  || maxTotBil > 2  )

Hospital admittance required.case 2: Case_1 !=-1  ||2 maxpotassium < hipotassium  ||2 minHb < lowHb  ||2 mincalcium < lowcalcium
